lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Look at that. Hey guys! Look at the baby! Hey, we love you. Can you hear us?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: We love you guys!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: What are you guys doing? I was hoping we weren't going to catch Travis in the midst of breastfeeding. How are you guys doing? Do you miss us?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So much!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We miss you so much!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We miss you too, we wish you were here. We have a little present for you. You guys ready? One, two, three.

lines.name: AUDIENCE, BRIAN
lines.text: (singing) Happy birthday to you, happy birthday to you, happy birthday dear Travis! Happy birthday to you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! [cheering]

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We love you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, you guys are amazing. I only have one request.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Hit me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mighty Nein, I want you to kick some fucking ass!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: Yeah! [cheering]

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll be watching along with you guys tonight.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: You'll be watching along? Okay, good.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we'll be watching. We earmuffed Ronin for that, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Totally. No cussing. Don't talk about them titties.

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: We love you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love you guys!

lines.name: BRIAN
lines.text: And-- Oh no. And your, my, our beloved Dungeon Master; give it up for Matthew Mercer! [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wow. Holy shit, y'all! Welcome to the poor unfortunate soul that had to follow Sam Riegel out on stage. (shouting) No, don't touch it! We all know where it's been!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shouting) Marion! Don't look, Marion!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is an incredible energy. Anyway--

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: It's high noon! [laughter]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Time to high noon is three minutes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, if you don't mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not advertising their Facebook page, or telling you the promo code GENCON2018 is what it is like I promised backstage. But this little stud's got to follow his heart. And maybe some other body parts. So if they'd want to know who to blame, why don't you just tell them by shouting my name?

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Sam Riegel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm done!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This one bookends the second and final half of the Vox Machina adventure, featuring all community-based art from all the incredible Critters out there. Taliesin, Liam, what do you have to say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (as Caleb) Well, if you were wondering why Taliesin was losing his-- (as Liam) Oh, I'm doing Caleb already. Taliesin was losing his mind the last several weeks while also dying. I quietly lost my mind at nights out in the National Parks, it's because we've been working on this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was the one thing I couldn't say on Talks was my first thought when Molly died was: I just lost three days off of my artbook schedule, oh god! Oh no! Please no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For more details on that as we are able to share them going on forward, including on-sale updates, go to critrole.com to keep up to speed on that. As a reminder, we have our Wyrmwood giveaways that we do during the breaks here for the Critical Role intermission. We'll be having one here tonight as well. So when we go to break, you'll have to jump over to the Critical Role Twitch chat, that's twitch.tv/criticalrole, we'll have a code at the time for you to enter, but be prepared for when that comes around. Let's see, I think that brings us mostly to the end of our announcements for the evening. It's time to get comfortable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! I feel so violated! Is this how you feel every time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a handsome shirt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Couldn't agree more. With all that out of the way, as we rein in--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mercer!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --our respective nerves and ridiculousness, I think it's time for us to come into tonight's episode of Critical Role.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (drum sounds)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (screaming) [click, TV static] [groovy Critical Role theme] [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aligning forces, they made their way northward, towards the city of Shadycreek Run, which exists outside of the laws and boundaries of the Dwendalian Empire. Along the way, they ambushed The Iron Shepherds, and in doing so lost one of their allies. With Mollymauk fallen on the battlefield and the rest left to simmer over the decisions they made, they continued northward, where they encountered a new friend, north of the city of Shadycreek Run. Caduceus Clay was pulled from his hermit lifestyle north of the city within the confines of the Savalierwood to join them in assaulting The Sour Nest, the keep where the Iron Shepherds call home. They staked out the outskirts of this location, managed to slay some of the guardians who were keeping watch along the outer perimeter wall, not necessarily very stealthily made their way into the entryway, but managed to take out a number of members of the Iron Shepherds, some of their paid compatriots, as well as some of their more elite, at least one of their more elite, fighters. Along with them they had met Nila, who is a firbolg who was searching for her also kidnapped partner and son. Using her druidic powers, aided them in this assault, and in doing so found and helped her family escape. As she absconded from the location with her family to keep them safe, the rest of you remained behind, trying to find out where the remainder of The Iron Shepherds reside within The Sour Nest and how best to deal with their presence. Last we left off, Caleb, you had sent Frumpkin, your familiar, in the form of a spider, to inspect the upper floor of the chamber, and upon feeling a squeeze from Keg, had just instilled her with the speed and alacrity of a Haste spell. And that's where we're going to pick up. In this moment, Keg, as you go to notify Caleb of what has transpired below, he reaches out and instills you with that familiar surge of adrenaline. Time seems to slow, your muscles tense and flex. What do you do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't hear you, but we don't have much time, so let's move forward carefully, please, and it's just the two of us so, you know, help me out, will you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Where's Frumpkin right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Further up. He's made it to the second floor, I think. I didn't pop out, so I'm seeing what Frumpkin sees at this point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a slow spider.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit. Is he one minute slow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (groans) I kind of want to-- no, I shouldn't-- just barrel ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can't hear a thing she's saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin has curled his way to the top floor and you can see there are the two open hallways here from left to right. Frumpkin would be-- I got two mics to make this work! Frumpkin appears on the secondary floor looking down both hallways in which there appear to be no signs of anyone at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love the cheers for foresight. They're like, "Yeah, two mics! Yes! Get it, production team!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Haste is running out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm so not stealthy. Unless I go downstairs, I just got to waste the Haste.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, but I can't hear you. Looking through Frumpkin's eyes, there's no time to waste. I've Hasted her to protect me since it's just the two of us, but I have to move upstairs. So I'm going to feel my way up the stairs and hope that Keg comes along.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb begins to slowly climb up the stairs, feeling out along these spirals as it carries from the bottom floor to the upper tier of The Sour Nest fortress.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While I ask Frumpkin to continue along the right path.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I need to make a stealth check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, let's do it. Four. That's going to go ahead and-- yeah, it's four. A nine?

lines.name: ASHLEY, MATT, AUDIENCE
lines.text: Nein

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Caleb begins to fumble his way up the stairs, Keg coasts up past him, double Haste speed, clanging all the way. Frumpkin can hear this from the top floor. You hear this heavy sound of like two giant bags of pots and pans. (clanking) You make your way to the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And this is where the plan falls apart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg, you have about two more rounds before your Haste runs out. You now see both sides of this hallway are open and empty. They both curl around the corner to show the perimeter and there are rooms in the interior. You see one doorway right across from where you entered.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How far is Caleb behind me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb's about 15 feet below.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you're not coming up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am processing right now. I haven't made a decision in a split-second.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter) I'm going to hold. I'm not going to keep going forward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In waiting for Caleb to ascend the stairs, the Haste spell comes to a complete cycle. Your body is filled with lethargic energy drain and you find yourself stunned there for a moment at the top of the stairs as the spell fades. But Caleb has joined you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that could have gone better.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry. I misunderstood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin, my boy, will you please go ahead?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, there it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will gently pull Keg around the corner of the left path, five feet, so we are not in direct view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This path here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, if Frumpkin's going this way, I will move Keg and I a little bit that way so we are not in direct view.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you begin to move slowly in this direction as Frumpkin slowly curls, in spider speed, further down this edge. There is a closed doorway here and it curves around this side. Do you continue? There's a door right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will let Frumpkin continue and watch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems there is either a linked chamber or two different rooms that have entryways right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing? Let's have Frumpkin look under that door that was just revealed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin peeks under the door, and unveils some sort of a rest chamber for a number of hirelings. You do see inside, currently, two sleeping hired members who have begun waking up from the recent sounds to go through their stuff.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, do they have matching Huey, Dewey, and Louie themed bed sheets? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's what they could find on Amazon. So yes, they do. They both, seemingly alarmed by the recent sounds of both the fireworks outside and the commotion downstairs--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was the fireworks, too. It wasn't just me. Okay, great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're going into these chests and pulling out their armor and they're in the process of putting on the leather armor. They're getting ready to scramble downward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're preoccupied?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I come out of Frumpkin's vision and I take Caleb-- Caleb is me. I take Keg by the hand and go close to her ear and whisper and say: Just follow me, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And tell Frumpkin to go up that side and we will go up the other side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I need to roll again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin can get there just ahead of me and peek around that corner before we turn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Frumpkin continues down this hall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We scooch to the corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys reach the corner as well and as you spin around the edge, you can see there are two doors that lead to two other chambers that are separated on the opposite end.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Rinse, repeat. I send Fumpkin under the first door, pull Keg a little bit further so we are by those doors.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go near the first door, Frumpkin enters this chamber, which reveals another shared bedchamber. Maybe more elite members of the Iron Shepherds call a room to bed for the evening. As Frumpkin enters this space, you hear the far door open up on that side. Footsteps, as the now donned armor and armed hirees of the Iron Shepherds begin to make their way down the stairs below.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull out the copper wire, listening, and I aim down, looking for Nott, and say: there are two coming from the upper floor. I don't know if they're leaving or coming away, but be alert.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! There's two coming, Caleb just-- oh wait, I got it! Caleb just warned me there's two men coming down the stairs to us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they look like Iron Shepherds?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me get out my copper wire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, don't worry about it, it's fine. You want to flank the door with me? You're not with me. You want to flank the door with me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's just us and Mr. Clay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll be the first to greet him. It should be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you guys are dressed like guards still.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still look like a guard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We are dressed like guards. Where are we? Are we on the outside of the cellar or are we down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are down in the basement still, after you sent Nila up with her family to exit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where's the body of the other guard we killed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up near the hatch on the upper stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he just chilling?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't put it anywhere else, so yeah, just sitting up against a wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's definitely, probably starting to turn a little weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is a little bit. It takes a while for the decomposition to take effect.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just killed him, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head upstairs and take care of this.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And shove the guard's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Down the stairs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, let's put him in the cage and maybe he'll--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Matt, are we in-- are they going to pass us on the way out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the stairs were down in the corner closest to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the one exit you have.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will say in the meantime that I would, of course, have sent Frumpkin into the final room to know if we have cleared this place up here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Frumpkin enters the final room, it reveals a large bedchamber adorned with more intricate silks and accoutrement, to design a garish but somewhat ghastly bedroom in dark reds and purples. You can see, on the side of the bed, a plate that still contains mostly eaten remains of some sort of creature. The room smells of a musty smoke and some thick animalistic musk. It's hard to pinpoint, but it's a putrid stench immediately once it hits Frumpkin's nose. But the room is empty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quickly, do I see anything of note in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know Caduceus, I think there's actually merit to your plan. I'm kind of into it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn shame.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damn shame.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not following, what are we doing? Am I an escaped prisoner?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we got an-- you really not following? I felt like that was really clear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just stay here in case-- when Caleb and Keg get back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to go attack these people with--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to see if I can get them to leave the house and if they don't leave the house, then I think you should probably shoot them with that thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're going to have them chase the escaped prisoners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Sounds good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is transpiring, what did you roll for a perception check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There doesn't look to be anything about the stonework or beneath the bed at Frumpkin's level that looks out of the ordinary. Frumpkin briefly leaps up onto the edge of the bed and you can see the bed, while it was once well made, seems to have been worn-- the actual cushion is sagged pretty heavy in the center-- it looks like it's been slept in for quite some time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Well, if we are still alive in an hour, there will be time for this later. I leave it. Listen, you're not going to see me for a while, but I will be with you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you mean? You'll leave me alone!?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I am not--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm canonically a coward! [laughter]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck it. I pull out the scroll of invisibility that Calianna gave me and recite a few words and I am gone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then you feel a tap-tap-tap on your shoulder.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is now also canon. Write that in your Wikipedias. Okay, I guess I'll go back down to everyone else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quietly please and I will not be walking right next to you, but a little ways away. You can trust me; I will not leave your side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Carefully.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you can tap me every so often to remind me of that, that would be great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, one other thing-- and there's a little flash on your shoulder and there is a large-ish spider.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (high-pitched) What the fuck!? [laughter]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little quieter than that, please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispers) What the fuck?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's the ticket. Let's go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, must I roll again? For stealth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For stealth? Yeah. Still with disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It didn't work. It's a ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's double digits!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Better than last time. By one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The audience's support counts for one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All these people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a scale in the right direction. So Keg, as you hold up your plates a bit, like you're trying to cross a puddle, you're trying to tiptoe down the stone hallway towards the staircase. The rest of you begin to hear what sounds like the arrival of footsteps rushing along the stone on the outside of the small hallway that leads to the trapdoor into the basement. What do you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to position myself in the corner between that-- hunch against the wall, try and lose my breath if that makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to face away since I don't have the disguise spell and look really perturbed towards the prison.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, are they in the little hall just outside the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's maybe a 15-foot wide hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I sneak into the far hallway that is away from the kitchen?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can do that. Make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that's a one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hide, just in case they come this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes, "What the fuck?" and pulls out his short sword.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab Nott by the scruff and lift him away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her you mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Her, oh thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a whole conversation there that I'm excited to have when we're not having, okay-- We need one for questioning man. We caught one of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let me go! I didn't do nothing wrong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, no, we got you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say shut up you miscreant and I backhand Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cries out)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I'll say make a deception check Caduceus, with advantage because you've been given help from your friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My deception-- That's 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to roll. He's going to do something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see his eyes, these deep, sunken brown irises staring back, as he goes "I don't think I've ever seen you around here before."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have his face though. I have the face of the one-- I'm not wearing a costume, am I?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "I have his face though."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean I look like one of the guards.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he had the disguise spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is small enough where we can theater of mind this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. Where's my initiative?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a seven Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can top that. I got a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 12. Not great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've got this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get to be part of this mix because I was coming down the stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will be in just a moment. You're catching up to it. You're coming around the corner. They were a bit quicker than you and you were trying to be stealthy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Trying being the operative word.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries, all right. Beau, you're up first-- they rolled really bad initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh what? Aw, cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as bad as these guys, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wasn't expecting that. The one who drew his blade-- I'm going to try and take an elbow and do a knockout crack right to his temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for attack.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Don't fuck me, Gil! [laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That wasn't a Gil die, but I'll let you know when it happens. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 11 damage and can I do a stunning strike? Crack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can. Saving throw on that is a six.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail! It's only worked like once before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one who just drew the blade-- as you crack him upside the head, he stumbles a couple of feet into the wall. As he backs up, you can see his eyes rolling around in the sockets and he's trying the grab the edge of the stonework to get his bearings. He has no idea where he is for the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As he backs up, I'm going to take his head and slam it back into the wall he just ran into.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Attack rolls have have advantage now because he is stunned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a beast!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Speech isn't capable given the series of events that have transpired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to say: Shut up! And crack him across the face again with my bonus, my off-handed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Also with advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was a Gil, but he did good. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nine damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're like, "Shh!" (crunching noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shh, go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to take my scarf, wipe the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes at a full run and then a dash, so he's about 60 feet away from you down the hallway getting near the front doors of the fortress.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to shout out: Hey Keg, we got a runner! I don't know if she heard me or not.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, Keg, you've just come down the stairs. Roll initiative for me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a 16, my friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll put you next at the top of the order. You see this guy cross around the corner as you step to the bottom of the steps-- there's a moment of pause where you both make eye contact, "Oh, this is awkward." We're going to finish up with Nott and Caduceus and then we'll come back to you. Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I peek around the corner where he just ran?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you have enough movement to get around and you can still see him as he's turning around the side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Leave no one alive! I'll fire. 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's not sneak, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not sneak attack, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six plus five, 11 points of damage. And a bonus action, I'll shoot again. That is a 21 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With another six points of damage. Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As both crossbow bolts (zooming) in his back, he reaches back and you can see the muscles in his shoulders pull back from the pain and he looks back in your direction then glances back at Keg. He's not sure which threat is more nominal at the moment. Caduceus, your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to peek my head around the corner and I'm going to blow a little bit and cast Sacred Flame.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a natural five on his wisdom saving throw. Dexterity or wisdom, I don't remember, but it doesn't matter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a dex 16 save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's not happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your damage on that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say: Never mind, Deuces got him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Got here a bit late. Is he dead?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hope so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He will be in a moment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I can leave him. He's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It looks like he's not putting up much of a fight at the moment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should I take him out? Okay. How far away is he from me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an attack with advantage because he's-- Sure, go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was an 18. Yeah, 18. It's plus seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't even have to roll damage. You walk up and you see him on the ground going (pained yelling) and rolling, and you shake your head.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shut up. 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a watermelon at a Gallagher performance you bring your war hammer down on top of his skull and paint a new carpet for the front entryway of The Sour Nest. At that moment, it doesn't appear like there's any immediate danger or movement. You all take a moment to look about and there's no sign of anybody else coming at the moment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A disembodied voice says: Oh! This is going wonderful.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jesus! Oh, I forgot you were there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was so easy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was great acting. It was very--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, let me go! I'm crazy! Ah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that was great. We still got two downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A strange blur streaks by. Caduceus, you see it from the upstairs. It looks like a blur of black. No larger than that big. It scoots past and curves around the corner, back in the direction of the basement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did somebody see something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to-- I don't know why I'm being quiet. We should head downstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard, you're still standing back by the hatch and something stops in front. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not great. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten? It wizzes right past you and you don't even have a moment to make out any details of what it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This place is fucking haunted.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It immediately heads down the stairway towards where you found Nila's family, into the basement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Follow it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got to follow it first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Kill it and follow it.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: No. Follow it then kill it.

lines.name: LAIM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job, Caleb!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am actually over here, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go downstairs. I'll go first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys have returned to the entry where you had met Nila's family and sent her off to protect them. You now head down the hallway that curves to the right. You had made some intel when you had sent Frumpkin earlier to see. You saw in the next chamber two members, Ruzza and Protto of The Iron Shepards, waiting on the opposite end, weapons ready, knowing you're coming. There appear to be two cages with people inside, but you couldn't make out any details.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I whisper into Nott's ear and say: (stuttering) Just this once, I think I should go first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps) You don't need to do this, Caleb, if you don't want to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not there anymore.

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: So brave! [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Brave. Dead. It's semantics, really.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, as you continue down the hall, unveiling it to the right, it still appears to be open without issue. You peek further down. The rest of you follow suit or do you stay in the back chamber?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: stealth-wise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go up and peek around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check, please. A stealth check for you too, Caleb, but you have advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll follow Nott.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stealth checks for all those that are going to follow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How close can I get without doing a stealth check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know. Do you want to be stealthy or not?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck. I'll hang back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Keg's going to make to the edge of the hall and just wait.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's happening up there?

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: The audience is aroused! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear as Ruzza looks over to Protto and goes, "Are they coming or not? I'm getting "impatient." Protto goes, "Yeah, maybe we should poke one of them." He pulls out a blade and jams it into the cage to the left. You hear a voice against the gag. A muffled yell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to move into the room and sit down on the floor between the cage and the door, pressed against the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja and just wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The hand slowly pulls the gag away from the mouth. Khary, if you'd like to join us at the table? [roaring applause]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The murmuring!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well, I don't know about you people, but I'm tired of this stabbing feeling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not hearing Caleb for a while, I'm going to, again, creep down the hallway and peek around a bit.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead. Take your time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do the thing? The Brady Bunch: where all of our heads are stacked while we peek around the door.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Screw it, I'm going to come too. I'm sorry!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you do some magicky things, Mr. Clay? Something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the three of your heads poke around the corner, all three of you shift as Keg slams into from behind. Both of their heads, who were currently bickering, of Protto and Ruzza look back towards the front. "Shit, they're here! Back up!" They both begin to retract and back up into the chamber behind them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I shoot?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you'd like to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to shoot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also have a thing I'd like to do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll shoot at-- it's Protto and Ruzza?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone, roll initiative.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ugh, farts.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope. That's not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably for the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, do we have-- (laughs) 25 to 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, oh! I rolled a natural 19, so I'm pretty sure that puts me at--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your dexterity bonus?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Plus three, so yes I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 22. You are tied with Ruzza.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's so nice to see familiar faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 to 15, anybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17 over here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Caleb, all righty. 15 to ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, come on. I know we want to make it interesting for the audience, but come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ashley Johnson has nothing on me in this realm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. ten to five?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually don't move until next combat, funny enough.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (high pitched) Three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two. (laughing) The lowest I can roll!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are going to go at the same time because you have the same dexterity. You and Ruzza are going to go at the same time, what are you going to do?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well let's see. The best thing that I can do is be the eyes of these people since I'm still working on getting out of my predicament. Let's say we move The Grand Duchess to a safe, but at least well lit, place to see the action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Duchess darts across the chamber, across from where the torch is, and perches upon a piece of the protruding stonework where she has a good view of the hallway where they're currently receding and the chamber you're in.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right, very good. How well do I see these two gentlemen who have been keeping me company?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The gentleman and the lady, you see them both pretty well. She, at the same turn, is running down the hallway. So what are you doing?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: What can I do besides trying to pick the lock? Is there anything I can do to knock it open at this point? I still only have one hand free, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been working on this for a while. You're still in the cage.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Freedom, baby! Man, I hate to use this so early in the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do it, these guys suck.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, screw it. You know what? There's nothing like a spiritual weapon to tear into a-- [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and what form is your spiritual weapon?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I said: plug her in! Nefertiti is in business. You know, I deal with royalty. I deal with queens and duchesses, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. With your view, you could drop it directly in front of Protto, or behind Protto to still try and get the strike. Would you want it in the front or the back?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Can I bowl her down that hallway and see how many pins I can knock over? I'm just asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this distance, you could get one. You'd be able to-- next round-- try again, but you could get the one.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right. Let's pick up this spare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say it bowls by and slams right there towards Protto. Make a spell attack roll for me, please. So d20, add your spell attack modifier.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Big baby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM, MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Seven plus--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It'll be your spell plus-- Oh, it's none of these.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Paperwork!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 unfortunately does not hit. Protto's a nimble fellow. As Nefertiti's mystical bust slams towards him, he dodges out of the way and goes, "Ugh!" and begins darting back towards there. That was your bonus action. You still have your action to either cast a cantrip or do anything else with your action, like pick the lock or anything else you want to try and do.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, I'd say we try to pick the lock a little bit to see if we can get out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's three plus three. So plus six to whatever you roll.

lines.name: LIAM, KHARY
lines.text: So 20 total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: (singing) Now I'm free, to do what I want!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Any old time!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, the cage opens and you can step out, taking your first breath of free air in a couple of days.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Ladies and gentlemen, it feels so good to be out with all of you beautiful people!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, does that finish your turn?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I do believe that does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Shakäste's run, Ruzza has darted to the back there. Let's see, that brings us-- Ruzza's going to hold her action. Nott, you're up next.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Protto still in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Protto is out of the room, but Protto is moving through the hall further down that way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to shoot him. But first, I'll run closer so I'm within 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You run to within 30 feet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Oh god. There's probably traps. Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. That's about 25, 30 feet right there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did I die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, cool. I will shoot my crossbow. Oh, that's no good. 12. No, 13!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 does not hit. Protto ducks out of the way as it hits some of the stone wall, sparking before it lands harmlessly on the wall to the back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One more shot, bonus action. That's better, 19!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does hit, roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's ten points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not bad. As he dodges the first one, the other one-- He tries to duck out of the way and instead, you see it vanish into the cloak. At first, you thought it just passed through harmlessly, but you hear an "Ugh!" and he falls and limps against the wall for a second before looking up in your direction with a snarl.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelp)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That finish your turn?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have I done all of my movement? Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Technically, you still have about 15 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just duck over towards Shakäste so I'm not right in eyeline of either of the hallway baddies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to duck over towards Shakäste, and your face hits something that's not there. It's like some sort of invisible force.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why do I keep running into things? I need contact lenses.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You immediately recognize the familiar scent of Caleb's coat right in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Caleb! Caleb, is that you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to slide out away from Nott and go to the other side, clear of the hallway, to look into the cage that's there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the cage across--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To the other side of the room. Is anyone alive or dead in that cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though it is a human child, it looks like they've both been in captivity for a bit and at least he's feeling protective of the child. They're both stripped of any necessary implements aside from just their clothing, and they look scared, but not too worse for wear.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Er, Hello... I am invisible. Stay as low as possible, and this will all blow over quickly, I think. That's the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That brings us to Protto. He's going to-- Is this working?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not working.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There we go. Protto's going to dart over to join Ruzza at the back and says, "Quick, send it "down!" Ruzza, who's been holding her action, reaches back and grabs some sort of a lever. At which point-- both of the archways to the front and the back of the chamber that you're in-- you hear this grinding of chains.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh. No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you out? You're outside of the room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I came in with you guys, I think. Am I not in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think you're in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beauregard, Keg, Caduceus, in the hallway behind, as you spin around the corner, this portcullis suddenly slams down, separating you from the other half of your party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt Mercer!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First the T-shirt and now this? You bastard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 17 plus four?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, that hits. For sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus six to hit. That hits. This is a longbow, not a crossbow. My apologies. That's two plus four. You take six points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yes, fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then he's going to dart around the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, I can take my little-- my reaction, can't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that thing called? Uncanny Dodge? Uncanny Dodge! I'll reduce that to three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go, so three damage to you. That's going to end Protto's go, as he darts around the corner. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I come around the gate. I look in and I go, hey, Shakäste!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Hello, darling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's up? What're you doing out here?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well, you know, vacationing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: More like a staycation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to hold my action and start wedging my staff up under the door, and maybe Deuces can help me crank it open.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually going to turn around and start searching that hallway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. Cool, man. Yeah. I'm not doing something really important here to keep our friends from reaching their peril.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hold your action to try to wedge it, look back for his help, and you see him turn the other direction and start walking away. Are you going to continue with your action or still hold it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Real cool, man. Keg?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try to pull a Nila and fucking rip that shit open with my bare hands. We will see! Come on, baby. No whammies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg comes through that. You have advantage on this because Beauregard is helping you because she's holding her action to help with that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck! So that's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bars begin to pull open ever so slightly, but not enough. You do feel, however, that whatever weight is carrying it down, it's heavy, but with two people you might have a chance of lifting it. But it looks like the bars are too thick to try and pull apart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did the wrong-- We should-- Under's better.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's okay. With our legs... lower back, you know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Keg's turn. Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to search this little hallway for a switch or some kind of panel to open this thing from this side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. Is there anything I can do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no. I don't find anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: After adding my negative investigation number, it's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start to just trace the stonework with your fingers and then find this really fascinating bit of moss. Soft green, it's been growing in the crevice. You haven't seen this type of moss before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, fella. Hi friend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You forget for the moment what you're doing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What? Oh. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Were our bedding arrangements not good enough for you? Oh, we can arrange for a much better place to "sleep, about six feet beneath this." Make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I hope you're wise.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I can do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wise as fuck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cannot be mocked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like water off a duck's back: doesn't bother you.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: (chuckling, then laughing) Darling, you just put one obstacle between us. You know I'm just going to knock that one down, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think they're in love.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, there's definitely sexual tension.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Ain't no mountain high enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. What are you going to do for your turn?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think she should just go slamming her ass all up and down that hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll another attack. d20, big one.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, that didn't work. Let's see, what did that end up doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you trying to roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your spell attack modifier. Should be a plus seven, I think?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh. So ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, once again Nefertiti goes grinding through the hallway, slamming near Ruzza. Ruzza quickly ducks out of the way and dodges over to where Protto is hiding.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: The Queen's used to having other people do her work for her, I guess. Why don't I point my middle finger down through those slats in the gate and send some Sacred Flame?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 13 plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's a good roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taliesin, is it wisdom or dexterity for Sacred Flame?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sacred Flame, save. You said dex?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, it was dex for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex. So that's a 19. That's a success. As the middle finger sticks through, she ducks out of the way. She's a wily one, that Ruzza, and she keeps dodging and weaving, dancing around your assault.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Next time, I'll use the other finger.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So much sexual tension. They had a thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get a room, guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing up Shakäste's turn, that brings us to Nott. What're you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, me? Again? I just went! Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're on deck, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to run up to the cage. Do I still see them? Through the portcullis?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see Protto, but you see Ruzza.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll take a shot at Ruzza!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pew! That's 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that'll hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get to roll, but still no sneak attack, damn it. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage to Ruzza.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess I'll shoot again. Yeah because I can't lift this thing, and I'm a wee thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you can certainly try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I can't. I'll just shoot again. That's an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits. Roll damage again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 11 points of damage. Ah! These are rolls! These are good rolls today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Firing between these bars of the portcullis, you fire both bolts. Both of them sink into the armor and probably pierce and intrude too, into the torso of Ruzza. As she falls back against the wall, "Ah, you son of a bitch." (panting)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'm going to duck around again so they can't see me. Just anywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right up next to you, you bump into an invisible Caleb again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aah! Are there duplicates of you? How are you doing this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am very stealthy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah! You are amazing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, it's your turn.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This seems to be going okay, not so bad. Are those tables by the gate that Keg and Beauregard are trying to pull up? Not the room I'm in. I am going to kick one over and roll it over because I can see Keg jimmying on the gate. I see where she is going with it and I am going to be ready to push it under once it's lifted up. I will hold my turn, but I am going to do that pushing my rear end out of the way of view of anyone even though I am invisible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just for the hell of it, make an athletics check for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What could go wrong? Big six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You manage to make it most of the way over but its a relatively heavy table for your size and diminutive form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have average strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can probably get it there by the end of next round but you're in process.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, there's a tiny table you can move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Caleb's go, it is now Protto's turn. Protto is going to go ahead and dart back around the corner, ducks beneath Nefertiti and then is going to take two shots at Beauregard but because it is between two portcullises he has disadvantage on the strikes. There is only one he can currently see down this long hallway. So the first shot is a natural 20 but disadvantage. That is a nine plus six. That is a 15 to hit. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss. 17.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second shot is 19 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, hits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, the second longbow shot releases towards you for eight points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to use my reaction to deflect missiles. Oh, I rolled a nine. Sorry! I should have dictated that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one goes wide and hits the wall beyond the boundaries of the portcullis. The second one you see coming towards you and you just catch it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I would probably have disadvantage if I'm throwing it back through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll do it! I'll do it! I'm going to pull some Gambit moves and try to-- right through the door. Toss it back.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Monk shit!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, this material does not breathe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, Gil fucked me! Seven!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to throw it and it hits the bar immediately upon releasing and shoots off at the side. It skids to a stop at the foot of Shakäste as he looks down at it, confused.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You've always been so thoughtful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to wait for Keg so we can hoist.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holding that. Keg it's your go. With advantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) 20!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20! [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, as you squat down to get your hands in the position to grab it you're like, "All right, "time to go!" As you go to reach for it, it's already lifted up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, it was really light actually, I don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Keg there just holding it up, both arms overhead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 'Sup. (tongue click)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau is aroused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, Caleb scoots the table back into space to keep it held somewhat aloft.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (strained) Yeah, this table is pretty heavy too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I have more things? Can I rush forward and try the second door?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would be an additional action, but you can move through the space if you would like.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I move through as well if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, you had to ready your action on your turn so you don't have any movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, copy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakäste, of all the friends that you recognize coming into this event, you watch as this short-haired, burly, gritty, stubble-chinned female dwarf in full jagged looking half-plate armor comes up with two heavy weapons: one a giant warhammer, the other a battleaxe. The edge of a mostly burned cigarette dangling at the edge of the lip. After holding this thing up and stepping through, dropping it behind her.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: So what's your name?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keg, as in booze or powder. Explosions et cetera. What's your name?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get a room you two! (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keg is aroused?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he flipping you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Question mark?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go both ways, baby!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Get a little momentary frustration. I'm going to drop this ridiculous form I'm in and go back to normal. I'm going to dive underneath the door, take a look, assess the situation. I'm going to take my staff, and I'm going to whisper to it: It's lunchtime, children. Let's throw a swarm of insects right into the middle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch the naturally twisted and gnarled wooden staff that Caduceus carries, which previously had a dozen of small knot holes in it, suddenly begin to exude dozens and dozens and dozens of small beetles that begin to swarm out of the staff and curling onto the ground. You can place it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I put it right on top of that problem in the corner, so it can't quite be seen by anyone down the hall, but close enough to bite?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 30 feet, you can't quite get it to them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even if I go all the way? Okay. How close can I get to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're right next to him. This swarm of beetles is right beneath the floating bust of Nefertiti.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can it make a bite attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It won't be able to attack this turn, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I get a bite attack on first appearance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but how close can you summon it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so it appears 30 feet--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can't move yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but it's not quite close enough to bite. It's about ten feet away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's cool. You look really cool. Hi.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Hello. So do you! I don't know who does your hair, but we could talk about it later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very impressed. Now that I realize that we're in fighting shot, I'm going to back up so I'm to the far left corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of your movement puts you right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's as far as I can get? All right, I'll go invisible until my next turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As a bonus action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! You can just do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You don't know me!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'm going to need somebody to teach me this trick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. At the top of the round, as you're all gearing, this bassy, resonant voice fills the chamber you're in. "Mm."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's rare that the meat carries itself right to your table." You don't see anything around you. That's all it says.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's invisible, too?! Everyone knows this trick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of the round, Ruzza, seeing that the scenario is turning and this trap scenario isn't going in their favor, darts away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Darts away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darts further down that hall. Shakäste.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Is there anybody still in that hallway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not that you can see. There is still that portcullis blocking your path.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Okay, let's see. Let's have the Duchess move a little further, through the slats into that corner, perch up there, and see if she can see down the hallway a little bit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They'll be okay in the end. There we go. Ending your view there, what are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marisha, did you just look at me? Is that what's happened? That's why you're suddenly laughing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) Yeah, fuck you. Sorry.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see. Oh, you know what? Is there a mechanism for opening that gate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can spend the rest of your turn investigating the room for something like that, if you'd like.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, why don't we do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an investigation check.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right. What do I roll again? 20? 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anything in the chamber. The only thing that you did notice was the switch at the end of the hallway that Ruzza had originally put down to send the portcullises falling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We saw that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You saw them drop the portcullises, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it a-- or a button?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a small lever that goes downward and causes them to be released, to slam down.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Too big for a tiny bird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For a tiny bird, yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Is that the end of my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have an action, if you wanted to try something else.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see, is there anything that we could do to shake this thing free?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spiritual Weapon it?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh yeah, why don't we slam the gate with Nefertiti? Let's see if we can find something she can hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Have Nefertiti roll an attack against the wall.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right. Natural one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's that big headdress. It's getting in the way. Yeah, restart it. Sometimes that what's you got to do with Nefertitis.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sometimes if you turn it off and turn it on, it helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the bust slams into the bars, the metal rings from the impact, but unfortunately the mild bulging of the metal on this side isn't enough to cause any damage. Does that finish your turn?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's it, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that brings it to Nott, with Caleb on deck.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nott's going to run up to the cage and reach out with her Mage Hand and try to flip the switch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good job, Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to inch around Nefertiti. Excuse me, Mrs. Titi. Pardon me. Is Protto still there, or did Protto bug out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Protto is ducked around the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Ruzza's still there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both disappeared around the corner, from your perspective.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All I see is a hallway and a swarm of bees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, swarm of beetles, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I don't want to go through the swarm of insects. I don't know what would happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Only one way to find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh Jesus. I will run through the swarm of insects, and bonus action disengage from them! I don't know if that works!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you dart and vault over the beetles, they seem to not pay you any mind or really care of your presence, but nevertheless, you dodge the shit out of them! They never had a chance!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just in case, I grab some chopsticks and I catch one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you turn around the corner, immediately, maybe ten feet from you, is Protto, who's currently pulling another arrow out of his bow and turning around the corner, glancing over. "Ah, shit!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I duck back behind the corner, or am I exposed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay. Since the gate is open, I'm going to start slowly walking down the hallway after Nott, sticking close to the wall. That's as far as I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's as far as you can get on 30 feet of movement. You can use your action to dash if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I could, but I don't want to do that. I will put Frumpkin on the wall, opposite me, ten feet ahead of me. I would love to give Frumpkin his turn to go as far along the ceiling after Nott as he can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the movement of the spider again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you know, 120 feet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Question: did we ever get the father and son out of the cage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, they're still in there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Frumpkin moves 20 feet along the ceiling on the edge, making his way further down, not full enough to reveal the next chamber, but is there nevertheless.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and I will just stay pressed against the wall and that is the end of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I halt everybody, and I say: Wait.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is absurd.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know. This feels like we're being lured right into a trap. We're following him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what it feels like, all right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where's Caleb? Caleb?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Caleb's gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's dead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who's the next in command when Caleb's not around? [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think this is a pretty solid fucking plan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's the solid plan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't have a plan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In Beauregard's ear, she hears: I am in the hallway ahead of you. Chill out for a moment. I will continue to let Frumpkin creep around, if we are in that sort of a scenario.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the moment, this is more of a chase sequence, as you guys are going after them. In this order, as we progress, next up in the order would be Caduceus. Caduceus, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to send my insects further down after them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bugs. The show's all about bugs now. Bugs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll hold my action in case I see anything, by the way, with my turn, if that's okay. Oh! Can I move in? I want to move in. I was talking to everybody. Mm-hmm. That's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to push to the far corner of the hallway and take a look down to see if I see anything. As far as I can get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't quite get that far. The invisibility lasts until the end of your next turn? The invisibility that you get?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, then now it's over.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As you pass in the hallway, you hear lightly: Entschuldigung.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey. Cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. As Frumpkin creeps around the corner, the last thing that Frumpkin sees in this area is another cage that is closed and locked, and another humanoid figure that is slumped inside, gagged and bound, chains, manacles behind the back, and similar to the other captives being held. There is a doorway that one of the higher guards is closing behind him, and for a brief glimpse, you see Protto and Ruzza further in the chamber with a torch light source within the next room before the door closes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I am able to now, I will send Frumpkin over the ceiling and down the door, and if there is a crack, he will go through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are the rest of you moving in further to the next chamber?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah, if there's no threat. I'll scan for traps as I walk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, motherfucker! 24! Best rolls of my life!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am the greatest rogue alive! I will go try and disarm that trap. Well, with my Mage Hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and attempt to do so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's plus seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's plus your dexterity modifier and your proficiency modifier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 even.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You manage to get the Mage Hand beneath, and at a quick glance, you can see this is not a mechanical contraption more than it's an enchantment on the piece of stone itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. So I can't disarm it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you do is the Mage Hand runs itself around the outskirts of it, pulling up the dust and dirt that has settled in to have it blend in with the rest of the stone, curling beneath, and pops it up, and causes it to fold up a bit, lift out the stone tablet, and drift it off to the side and set it down. The trap is still armed, but that part of the floor has now been moved out of the way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we can step over, around it? Yes! Wow! Caleb! Are you right next to me? No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're sending Frumpkin into the next chamber?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. If there's a gap, ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a slight gap. Roll a stealth check for Frumpkin this time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin's not invisible, is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. He's a spider.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good news. I rolled a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin curls beneath the door frame, revealing this other hired guard that was back further in the chamber. Protto and Ruzza, they've lifted another barred trap door that guards another set of stairs that goes deeper below into another chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A dungeon in a dungeon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're stepping further down into this next bit, at which point Protto looks over his shoulder and goes, "Hurry!" (arrow firing) No, he gets an attack before you can pull him back. That's a 16 plus six; that's a 24.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's only one point of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 11 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A rapid-fired arrow about that long, I'd say, against a spider would look terrible if it wasn't a fey entity that dissipates into dust as it blinks back into its home dimension.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does your beetle swarm last?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It probably only has a few more, maybe ten, 15 more seconds before it fades.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we have followed behind at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys could've followed and got to the next chamber behind them, if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can we say that we did that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, can we all convene in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Before we do anything else.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Can I bring my Spiritual Weapon with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: As ineffectual as she's been.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's tried, though.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: She's tried.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Nefertiti floats in behind Shakäste as you're stepping inside, the spell begins to blink out, running its course.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You tried, baby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see now, there is the unconscious humanoid--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The unconscious humanoid figure in the cage before you, and the closed door where they all vanished behind, and you hear (clanging) Sounds like some sort of metal object or slab has fallen solid onto flat ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need to check that door. I don't know if it's trapped or--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which door? The door that I just checked or the next door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You checked a trap in this room, didn't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the hallway that leads to the first chamber.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about this door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Frumpkin went under a new door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know about more rooms than I do. I just checked the door in the front of the first room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You checked for traps right there, and there was a trap on the floor right in front of that doorway. You disabled it, moved it out of the way, and now you guys are looking at the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I point invisibly and say: The door that I'm pointing at! That one!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't see-- I don't know what you're saying. Waft your smell in the direction that--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A gentle knock happens on the door in front of her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the door that I checked? No? Yes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't check the door, you checked the room for traps, and that was the trap you saw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the door! The door, okay. I'll check the door. Why don't you check the cage for these fellows?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I was just thinking the same thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 17 on investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door does not appear to be trapped. It is locked, however, from the other side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The other side?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll help search the room as well. I'll look for any other triggers or passageways.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Any objections to me trying to chop this door down? Is it made of wood? I should ask first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is made of wood. It has some metal framing to it, but it's wooden primarily.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, I would prefer it. We are blown anyway, so have at it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, here we go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what about these people in the cage?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, I was thinking, maybe can I investigate these people that are in the cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You walk up to it, and there are the two people, the small child and the dwarf, in the previous chamber where you were locked, and in the chamber you just discovered there appears to be an older gentleman in his maybe late fifties, early sixties or so. Looks pretty bruised up; one eye is swollen shut, the other looks pretty bloodied as well. He's chained from behind and has the gag in his mouth, as well.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Can I at least get in to move close enough that I could get the gag out of his mouth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You go ahead and pull it free-- "(gasping, panting) Who are you?"

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: We're friends. We're going to get you out of here. How are the bindings on your hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They hurt." You can see he looks weak. He probably hasn't eaten well in a number of days. As part of the process of mentally conditioning those they capture, it's minimal sustenance and a lot of mental and psychological damage, as well as physical torture to go along with it. You've seen and endured some of it, but looks like some of these other figures have gone through more of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have one goodberry left over from Nila that she gave me that I didn't eat. So I'm going to hand him the goodberry--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, his hands are bound.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to feed him the goodberry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at you with his one semi-good eye, and, "What-- What are-- What are you-- Why?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What, you don't like berries?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (shouting) Just eat the berry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
