lines.text: He looks at you-- "(sobbing)"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(sobbing) Aah," and just sadly eats the berry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, it's not too bad."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Antioxidants, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Açaí."

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: What's your name, friend?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jusca."

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Jusca.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm just a farmer, I don't know why they took me." He pulls against the constraints from behind. "Can you get me out? Can you get me out, please?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We are just giving them time to be ready for us. We need to proceed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, we need to move. Sorry about your ears, grandpa! Then I smack the door with my hammer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make an attack roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're the worst person.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughing) I am, I'm sorry. The door, with my axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Door, yeah. Make an attack roll for the door.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a 20. Not a natural, just a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no; that hits. Go ahead, roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Mage Hand to unbind his hands.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll dexterity.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's an eight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? It takes you a little bit, but you do manage to get the manacles off the back of his body. You rolled a?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: An eight. Damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: An eight. As you come down with your battleaxe, you all hear the resounding (crash) as it slams into the wood, splintering and breaking it a bit. You can see a brief gap where you've managed to get two of the wooden boards to separate and start to splinter. You're starting to go full Shining on this door. With that impact, over the next moment, with repeated hits, you definitely can see your ability to cut through this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can I do it again--? Can I get through?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. As that's happening, the bindings are now freed, and Jusca brings his wrists up and rubs them. You can see where the strain has caused red, bloodied lines across from the tension where he's pulled against the restraints. Sallow, this long-bearded chin out of neglect. He looks up with a faint glimmer of hope and a smile to the rest of you, and says "Oh, tha-- thank you."

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: He's still in the cage--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still in the cage, yes.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Still locked in the cage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Should I try to unlock that thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll a d20. Plus your dex bonus, and your proficiency bonus. It'd be plus... six, I think?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Six? So 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17.It's going to take you a bit. You're starting to get through it, but these cages are designed to be hard to pick. You take the better part of a minute to do so. In the meantime, you--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So Matt? Hypothetically, if I rolled a critical failure trying to go Shining on the door, what would happen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be very us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Intermission.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: In theory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, your axe goes wide, and as opposed to hitting the actual wood manages to catch a heavy part of the metal reinforcement on the door frame. As it hits, that heavy impact sends reverberations through your arm and body, like the worst--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tinnitus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tennis elbow you've ever felt. At that minute, a voice, familiar, creeps in again in the space around you. "What are you planning to accomplish? You've killed a few bottom-barrel "goons, but you're in my domain now. I had first planned to make you into premium contraband when "finished. However, I may just keep you all as my own personal pets." Make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get this door open.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have to make a saving throw, Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, baby; character development! 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That driving surge of vengeful confidence beginning to burn in your belly once more.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is a 20 on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your second swipe, you bring both your battleaxe and your warhammer together in one giant swing, both splintering the wood, and the force of the hammer splintering and breaking the two main heavy wooden boards that hold the majority of the right side of the door by where the hinges hold it on. As you break through, the door breaks on the top side, and then swings open, the apparatus which keeps it there, wedged in that door, broken partway and now rendered pretty much useless. The chamber in front of you is now left open for you all to see where the three members, both Protto, Ruzza, and the third thug have vanished from the chamber. You see a table on the far end and a brazier burning with a low flame, and then the stairway below has a set of bars, like another trap door that is a gate that seems to have closed and locked behind them.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I like your fire, Keg.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (panting) Thanks. I'm going through some shit. Can we get this gate open?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe. Nott, will you have a look at it first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. How you doing over there, Shakäste, with the gates-- the cage?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think I'm almost there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. At this point, Shakäste, you do manage to finally get the final tumbler of this one lock to-- (tumblers clicking, creaking) It opens up, and with that the older gentleman steps out, takes one step towards you, and half-collapses into your arms. He's drained of energy. (thump)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that goodberry...

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, that's the only berry you got.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Electrolytes...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rights himself. He's not unconscious, he just kind of stumbles and then gets back up and leans against the wall, breathing heavily.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Right. There are a couple of people that are in the chamber around the corner here that are also trapped. How are you with a lockpick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) We're deputizing the guy we just freed?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You know-- Hey man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at you for about ten seconds, blinking the one eye he can blink--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Never mind. Never mind. Thanks for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I-- I make radishes grow." [laughter]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll come back for them! We'll come back for them.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah. I say, You know what? Go to the chamber around the corner, stay there with the people who are there-- who are caged. We're going to let you all free in a bit, but we've got some business we've got to take care of. We're going to make sure these people don't do this again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, Hey. When was the last time you've seen Lorenzo? Did he go this way? Has he come back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sorry. I haven't noticed. I'm sorry. I try not to make eye contact. They don't like it when I do."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see a blue tiefling or a green, sort-of-gradient-colored half-orc, and maybe an amazing-looking white and sort-of, kind-of-black, dark angel thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks to you, first kind of still taken aback by the goblin face, and the sharpened teeth, and the yellow eyes staring back. But he calms himself. "Uh, I think those were the new projects "he took below."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Projects? I don't like that--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We've got to move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb is already in the next room, steering clear of the trap and trying to inspect if that brazier is arcane in nature, or if there is anything dangerous other than the trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: While he does that, I'm going to go immediately for the gate and look at that, into the stairs, and see what the deal is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you looking for traps or anything, or just looking?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to investigate it and see how I can potentially open it if it's locked, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Beau. As you approach the gate and go to look towards it, the brazier flame flickers.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I jump back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, just as a gout of flame juts out in your direction--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If only I had gotten to say natural 20 before that happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you realize what it is just as it happens, and you're like "Oh!--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's one of those--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh) A cone of flame just bursts forward from the brazier in your direction. I need you to make a dexterity saving throw, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. I rolled a two. So nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take ten points of fire damage as it just incinerates past you. And you take a step back, and the flame is now super small. Like it just expended a lot of its fire energy. In the brazier it's just this low flicker. And it begins to burn brighter again--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aah! While it's going, I'm going to see if I can yank open the thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whining) Can I do athletics? [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a straight strength check unfortunately, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Um, I'd prefer a nature check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll a d20, add your--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Don't fuck me...

lines.name: MARISHA, AUDIENCE
lines.text: Gil!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (creaking) It begins to bend. You can see now where they've left it to lock behind, it latches when it's dropped. And where the latch has stuck in, it's been locked underneath. It's starting to pull apart. The metal is bending. It's not strong enough to break; it will take another round to do so, but it's starting to give.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to rush forward and help. Do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And am I aware of that the trap? What sets it off, since I got the natural 20?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes: proximity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Proximity alone?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Um... (nervous laugh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, go ahead and make a strength check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunting)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm still trying to help!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21. Beau, as you're pulling, your muscles getting sore that the veins bulging in your arms and your neck as you're yanking as hard as you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunting) Keg, do I look buff?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (grunting) Yeah! Yeah you look great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (grunting) Thank you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg joins in with you and both of you-- Ping!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I look buff?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another blast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you succeed. Beau, unfortunately you do not. So that's going to be 12 points of fire damage to you, Beau. Six points to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aah, I still get burned!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take half damage though. And you watch as the flame now turns to a small cinder and begins to (rumble) rise once more, regenerating its flame power.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it-- the brazier, it's in the wall? It's inside the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a stone bowl of some kind that is in a small pedestal that looks decorative on the corner that contains a small ember. But the ember itself seems to be magical, and whenever anybody walks within a certain distance of it, it just sends a gout of flame in their direction.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I Mage Hand grab it and throw the bowl across the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well first off, you both are in proximity; you have the stairs below, what are you doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are we dexing it down, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We drop down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, both Beau and Keg vanish down the stairs. Just as the flames (roar) over the direction they were, but it passes overhead without any harm. You've managed to pull out of the range of this brazier. Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That looks like a big bowl. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pretty large.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think I can lift that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it looks like the stone bowl itself is probably built into the pillar, it would weigh far too much for your Mage Hand to move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get down there without the fire thing happening again? Ah, oh. Wait, Caleb, are you in the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am in the room. There are a couple of options. I could dispel it; It would take me about ten minutes. I would no longer be invisible, we would lose time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten minutes? No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The second option is that we just run for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just going to just tap my staff and cast Dispel at third level.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes! [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what is it, what are you doing? Dispel? You can do Dispel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What can't you do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a second level spell, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why weren't you always playing this character?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dispel Magic-- Dispel Magic is third level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dispel Magic is third level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Third level, all right. So, I'll cast that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flameless. Just a pile of blackened ash and whatever source of this enchantment is rent useless.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good job, Caleb!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a deep, deep sigh in the room, and then Caleb descends into the hole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, if they just asked I would've-- I don't know. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you all continue down the stairs after your friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go, yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah. The Duchess perches on my shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (humming) Just stops there. Wings tucked up, long beak, breathing really fast. (panting)

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Keep a sharp eye, darling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As Deuces and Shakäste come down the stairs, I say: Does this look bad to you?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Ugh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I show them my scorched, really burnt arm, because it hurts real bad.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It doesn't look good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't look that good.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah. Is there anything I can do to help you right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that was kind of my question. I just didn't want to ask outright.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's very passive-aggressive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a potion if you need it, Beau.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have two potions, don't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uh...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Let's wait for the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the clerics to weigh in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For the healers-- The clerics to finish their council.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: [hooting and laughter]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But Shakäste, I got you that nice arrow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want it now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, now I want it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a greater healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, greater healing potion, so that's 4d4 plus 4.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa! You have two of those?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah baby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw yeah, baby!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Kids, you heard it here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, good roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So 14.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you! 14 points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shakäste, would you, er-- Friend, would you do us the favor of... Stacy-- Is it Stacy or Anastasia?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's Anastasia, baby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I used to have a cat. I do not any longer--

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Aw!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you do us the favor of having a peek around with your bird, friend?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That sounds like a lovely idea. Grand Duchess, if you wouldn't mind taking a peek?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you all begin to prepare the continuing descent, the stairs only travel down about 25 or so feet before a low, red-lit chamber, and steps that go on beyond. So you have a view down to where the base is. The Duchess begins to coast down towards that space. That's where we're going to take a break.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh! [applause]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lorenzo has a red room!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long is this break, Matt? What is this, ten minutes? 12 minutes? How--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll come back with the winner's name at the end of the break. We'll see you here in 15 minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone check out the D&D Beyond booth!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Stretch your legs; hydrate!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Are we back?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We look back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We good? All right. We on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think we're back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, welcome back everyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do we have a winner from the giveaway?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we back online again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think we're back on the stream. I have not been given a winner. All right, we'll get it done in chat. Whoever won, congratulations. You'll find out soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we on the internet right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think we are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Bringing us back in, getting the music going.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just got so nervous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any other preparation you guys want to do before you descend the stairs?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I would like to render Aid to three friends of mine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You'd like to what?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I have an Aid spell that before we go into the fray, I believe these two beautiful ladies have been taking a lot of the brunt of damage and deserve a little something extra. So I say they take Aid--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2nd-level? The base level?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Level two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, yeah. So that's five temporary-- sorry, your hit point maximum increases by five for the next eight hours for Beau, Keg, and who else?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I think I'll give it to myself as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. So that's five more maximum hit points, and you gain five hit points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And we gain five hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, with that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So are you both healed now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ish.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have 41 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Out of now 51.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just to get that out of the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Deuces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here we go. That's (counting) 12 points to you, and ten points to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hell yeah. Thank you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's cool.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Couple of tanks up in here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Duchess heads down into the chamber, and it opens into a T-shaped chamber facing your direction. The stairs here descend down into this area. The room is low-lit with a red glow emanating from two furnaces, one on each side there with faint red embers and bits of ash that flicker out with small bits of flame.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Now I don't want my baby to go too far, okay? Just let her see what's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hovering right there?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'd say yeah. Just enough to stay in the shadow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a stealth check for your Duchess. Roll a d20, add two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw, buddy.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Duchess perches right in the middle of the floor, right there. She's sitting right there. You think Duchess is hidden. What else do you guys do?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well, here's the thing. If she's sitting right there in the middle, can she see better than if she were in the shadow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From looking inside and seeing some of the chamber-- I'll give you a little more of a view of what's inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Silver linings!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's this unnatural heat that fills the interior of this chamber. The air smells of coal and burnt flesh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The map looks like a cock and balls! [laughter, cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Spoilers!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hopefully not, proportionally. That'd be a little sad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you seen me? You can see me.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: From what I've heard, you know, it's all about girth, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan's gone, man. Scanlan's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a number of metal brands hanging against some of the walls, where they are carried over to these furnaces to be heated as torture implements. Further into the central chamber you see a table. You see, in the middle of this rounded chamber, flanked by empty chairs, this stained, stretch leather-topped table, leather draping over on each side almost to the floor. You see heavy chains dangling at the front and the back of it, as this is probably a location where individuals are strapped to and tortured. Two sets of prison barred doors flank the opposite ends that seem to have larger containment chambers beyond there. They look to be heavy and very locked and barred. What would you like to do?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'd like for the Duchess to come back and perch on my shoulder, frankly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, Duchess heads back up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, it's not like they don't know we're coming.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So we are inside the-- we've lifted open the hatch, right? There's no other doors going down to the downstairs, right? That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This currently looks to be the only continued path downward, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are the stairs wide enough for two people to go down? Three people to go down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Individual.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Individual. That blows.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: They're hiding, they're waiting.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can go first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, no! Caleb is invisible. I mean, I don't want to lose you, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And you're noisy af.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, they know we're coming. This isn't going to be a surprise attack, I'm assuming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think they would grant you the graces that they did before and spare you if they saw you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Now? I don't think so.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Have they seen you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, Shakäste! There's a really long story.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's all right, you can tell me later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She used to work for them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But not anymore!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Not anymore. Right. But have they seen you since you've changed your affiliations?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well then, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if this-- they know you, right, Keg? You could say, "All right, I'm coming down, Lorenzo!"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that what you think I sound like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a pretty good-- I'm like Rich Little.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you as good at impression as you are a detective?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I could send--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Sidebar, Rich Little was an impressionist from the 70s and 80s, kids. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could send down an image of you that looks like you, and so if they attack right away they'll be fighting against just an illusion!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's not a bad idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks, Nott. What do we think about that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a pretty impressive illusion--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I like the idea of sussing them out, since they're obviously hiding down there. Because from what the Duchess saw, she saw the chamber, but no one was in it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I agree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are able to do something so substantial?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not of substance, if that's what you mean by substantial. Wherever you are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm right in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm right in front of you. I'm talking about--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I got an ear. I can do something that goes down and looks like Keg?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As big as Keg?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As big as Keg, yes. Keg's not very big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It can't make noise though, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, she'll make the noise. I'll make the video.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we're going to do a ventriloquist act.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can you do that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you know, that's step one. Step two is much different, because then what if they come out and attack? Then what do we do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, last thing that we want is for them to have the element of surprise on us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So as long as we can get them out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Will I try?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going to suck either way, and I don't want to die, but we might die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So am I pretending to try and be stealthy? Am I going: Yo fuckface? Like, what's the vibe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean the second thing is more you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true. I mean, trying to be stealthy and failing is also very me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that thing you said earlier? Fucko? What was that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh. Eat shit, fucko.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I liked that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw, thanks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That feels solid.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was thinking about it for a while, like if I ever saw him again--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'd be like: Eat shit, fucko.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm glad you workshopped it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It felt pretty good when I did it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Never throw out your first draft. You know, never show that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was working on that for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's great. That's good. I admire that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, you know if you see him again, though, you can't go back to old material. You need some--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's why I was thinking fuckface. Well, is fuckface a step down from fucko?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fuckface is different.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean it's in the same range, I guess.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What would you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would say: Eat shit, you rusty spoon! I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You rusty spoon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're deviating though, from the brand, you know?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you know he doesn't have any hair. Maybe you could be like: Baldy McGee!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw baldy! You fucking chrome dome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fucking chrome dome! Nailed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Making fun of someone's appearance is very good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Works every time.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That'll really get him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nothing will get him except that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm coming down-- an illusion of me is coming down the stairs. I'm going to try and ventriloquist the illusion to say, Hey chrome dome--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh huh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is going to go great. Let's do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, fucking chrome dome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, fucking chrome dome!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are we doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're workshopping a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're drawing them out, and then once we know their position, I guess we'll just run and gun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's stop making so much noise and try it, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, so you start with an, "I'm coming down," or something and then you'll "come down."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Should I do the chrome dome line? That's what we're going with? We workshopped it a little bit.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I like the chrome dome line.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You worked so hard on it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Could be on the movie poster. It's great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So Keg shouts down, "Hey, you fucking chrome dome!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Language.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nailed it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I drop a bit of fleece and cast Silent Image and make Keg walking down the steps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you watch as this quiet, soundless image of Keg--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go like this!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rattle! Rattle! Rattle!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Clang! Clang! Clang! Clang!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a radio play!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to use a little Thaumaturgy to make sure it's actually got some noise to it. I'll puppet it a little bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! With coconuts you can make it sound like horses!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have a coconut. I--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think we're mixing. I think the streams are crossing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So yeah, I'm going to give it a little bit of sound.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It worked super well right?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You got two husks and you're smacking them together.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm clanging down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're making the clanging sound.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Illusion Keg is clanging down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, me or her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on, Burch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Hello my baby, hello my darling, hello my ragtime gal...

lines.name: MARISHA, AUDIENCE
lines.text: Keg! Keg! Keg!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's middling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Above average.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You angle yourself at the top of the stairway to make sure that the sound of your armor shaking--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least disseminates into the air as much as possible. The image can only walk 15 feet, because that is the distance of the cube. So the illusion appears near the top-- or near the middle of the stairs--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: There's a bit of an echo right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Descends and steps no more than ten feet out from that and stops.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, and starts like, narrowing its eyes and looking around. Just sort of mean and maybe gets a cigarette. I don't know how she has so many of them. Does she roll them? I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's just the same one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this moment, you hear (projectiles firing) and you see as a bit of the dangling leather over the table bows slightly. And from the opposite end, something darts across the hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From which side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One appears to emerge from underneath the table out this way. Another seems to shoot out from this side.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What shoots out?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: This is some Indiana Jones shit that's happening right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The image of Keg falls to the floor, clutching her shoulder.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can make it sound-- I'm going to use Thaumaturgy to make it sound like she's in pain. So--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (groans) Oh, it hurts!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm holding the crystal up like a microphone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw! Shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you give me, like... three big deaths, three medium deaths, and three little deaths? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh! Winner! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Some open mouth, closed mouth kind of shit. I'm just going to need a lot of-- I'm going to need a palette to work with.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah! Aw! Agh! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A moment passes before two more (projectiles fire). These strange, quick objects moving at a rapid speed, cross by. Another one hits the bottom of the stairs and clangs to a rest. This one you can actually see it. It appears to be a rather long, solid crossbow bolt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, I don't know. I don't know what happened.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw! That was my good hand!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's a trap. Maybe it's definitely a trap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, step one went really well. What do we do now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are there any other crossbolt-y things?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nott, can you Mage Hand and lift up the little leather skirt of the table, and see what's under there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This seems a bit far.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's also-- It's not a trap, is it? Because there's no weight to your illusion. What would have been set off?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's motion-sensored.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It could be someone under the table.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: No, it's not a motion sensor. They see it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's a person firing.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: They see it. There's somebody watching.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a person firing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes it's someone--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's Protto.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Where are those shots coming from?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From under the table, and also from somewhere else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe it's Protto and that lackey.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well we know that Protto shoots arrows, right? And then someone else could be the other one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then they had that hired hand with them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. That's them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would we be able to see anything to make perception checks from here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not up in the stairway, you'd have to descend into the actual chamber to see.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I still got firecrackers. Just throwing it out there.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: There you go. Now we're talking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take out a cherry bomb. I light it, I throw it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact, sizzling noises)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait for it... Wait for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (explosion)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, go! Go! Go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're going in?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Aah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure! I'll run down the stairs and I'll fire as soon as I see anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they seem distracted?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott runs down the stairs. Who's after Nott?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll tumble down the stairs, doing a barrel roll and some parkour shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you stopping where Nott is? You can move a little further or elsewhere, wherever you want to go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I tuck behind the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and crouch and peek.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Who else is going where?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do the same. On the opposite wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg you go ahead to the opposite wall?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can get to just about there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb will come invisibly down, but not leave the stairs. He will stay on the stairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, halfway down. But you can leave him up there for the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakäste?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'm going to stay back, and put the Grand Duchess over on Keg's shoulder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the Grand Duchess is currently residing, we'll say, over here by Keg. That will represent he Grand Duchess's current position.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispering) What the fuck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you're staying back up in the stairway.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You know what? You had a spider on your shoulder before; this should feel much better.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's all weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're staying up behind Caleb, up in the hallway?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so your vision, with the Duchess you can see beyond that but you do not have--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: A full--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ability to actually hit something unless you move down below. Just a heads-up.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think i'm going to-- Oh god-- We don't want all the magic in one place. That seems like a bad idea. I think I'll pull off and hug the wall to the left and get as far back from that corner as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. (counting) At this moment, make a perception check, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, as you came down the bottom of the stairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 12. Plus nothing, Taliesin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You look down and see the empty chamber. No movement. Beauregard, you were looking around the corner. Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god! Five. Right? That was a two, plus three. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg, you make a perception check as well, since you're both at the wall.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, baby. (singing) 20! [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank the gods.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg, as you hit the wall and glance around the side, you can see a humanoid shape ducked into the shadows underneath the table in the center, who has pulled a heavy crossbow from underneath the leather and aiming it at Nott, which does attempt to shoot. That is a 17 to hit. What's your armor class?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It hits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits. For that, Nott, you take eight points of piercing damage as a bolt hits right towards the kneecap and actually sticks out the side, you almost falling to one edge.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will dodge uncannily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Reduce that to four. Caduceus, as you walked around the corner, you turn around to see and come face to face with Ruzza, who is back up against the corner, and looks towards you and goes, "What the fuck?!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I have time to do a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, now we roll initiative.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unveiling. This guy's down there. Oh god, Caleb fell. Let's go ahead and do this, guys. You guys got a little cluster at the top of the stairs, goddamn it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, this is so embarrassing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you say roll for initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. All of you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry, Mr. Clay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is not going to be good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have a bonus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do I got as a-- it's bad enough I'm looking up reactions! [groaning sympathetically]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have 25 to 20.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have Beau. Than we have Caleb and Keg going at the same time. 15 to ten?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No? All righty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't like this music.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know, so spooky!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten to five?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Taliesin, really? No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you get, Shakäste?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 23 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a very big hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Really shitty damage roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four piercing damage? Can I also uncanny dodge that, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're going back to the next combat round. You technically have not gotten your reaction yet. So no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what? I won't, just in case I want to react to something else.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, that finishes Protto's turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did Protto duck or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Protto is currently now behind the table and using it as cover.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I cannot see The Devil Wears Prada?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you cannot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was waiting for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was only a matter of time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [cheering and laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you rush up and glance over you can see Protto, back against the table--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pulling and stretching a bolt and goes "Huh?!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on! Come on, girl!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to fuck you up-- Oh, shit! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He instinctually slaps his hand up and it knocks your arm and it causes the shot to go firing off into the distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will reload and fire again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit, that'll hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, that's cocked. Okay, ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's hurt, he's not at death's door but he's looking pretty hurt. All righty, Nott--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll duck down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chanting) B-B-Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (air horn) I'm going to pop around the corner. Pop around, and I'm going to go towards where Nott is. Keep going. Do I see anybody to my left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, you see the other thug immediately around that corner, who is also firing from that side across the way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Doubling the dice damage. Ooh, that's a seven! So 14 plus four, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of damage to him, nice. All righty. So with a heavy clock to the side he gets thrown back into a torch that is in the wall. That catches flame a little bit on his shoulder and he brushes it out. He is looking both distracted and pretty hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's cool. I'm going to take my off hand, I'm going to run and just take the edge of my arm into his throat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, second strike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second strike, 14?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, does hit!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, because he is just a lowly guy. He is not as well armored as his compatriots. So...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not great damage: six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six damage. Whack to the throat! (gasping) He's now having a hard time inhaling. He's still standing but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to take palm to his nose and try and bat his head back into that sconce behind him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good god.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Come on girl.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last hit, last hit. That's not good: 12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to hit a third time and he's a little wiser and manages to push off. It's a sloppy parry but he manages to avoid most of the brunt of the blow and pulls back. That end your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, I'm going to stay here and just be on this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That brings us to Caleb and Keg.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can choose who goes first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: After you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, ja, okay. I think--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Unless, I can go first if you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm already gone. In my head I think, This is still going very well. I have not been hit; here we go. And I'm at the bottom of the stairs already, not at the top, so what I would like to do is move my full movement and then use my action to dash. And just stroll to the right of Nott, and I will just touch her on the shoulder as I go; and get as far as I can in that direction against the wall, if that's as far as I can get. So 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get all the way over here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And thinking, This is okay. This is okay. That's the end of the turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're in full poop stance?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So now me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Squatty Potty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Typically.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I get to Protto?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Protto? (counting) You kick a chair to get there, but you can get right up against him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I say, Hey, little shit! And then I whack him. That's a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swing with the battleaxe and it actually gets wedged into the table. You have to put your foot on to manage to free it from the wood.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. Trying again. Okay, that is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 does hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. Okay, great. Okay. So that is seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage to Protto. With the warhammer, whack! to the side of his head, he's pushed up against the side of the now partially-splintered table, but he is still keeping his cool about him. He's hurt, but hanging in there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't smack him again with the bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your bonus action you can, yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, well then I'm going to fucking do that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a dual wielder! You got this girl!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, does that-- 15?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Protto manages to just duck out of the way as your hammer slams into the bottom side of the table where he has been using to break for cover. And it causes this huge open hole, this gap, almost like a porthole in the top of the table where you can see through. As you manage to pull back your hammer he kind of looks up through it right at Nott. "Aah!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finish your turn Keg?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. You now hear once again, a familiar voice.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Crawls from the space that says...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (quietly) This fucking sucks, right?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: (whispering) I hate him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [jeering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you hear this momentary vibration of metal cutting through the air, before-- That is going to be a 20 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yep, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 17 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You have Aid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 16 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Miss! The second one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see in that same kind of thickened leather-studded bits of armor and bracers, a bulging, muscular, blue-skinned body. Where once was a bulging bald head with tattoo, two horns emerge from the front. Bits of a blackened beard on once was a hairless, humanoid form, now curling down the front of the chest and back of the head, one central plume behind. You see there before you what is Lorenzo, or at least, his true form.

lines.name: SAM, AUDIENCE
lines.text: Oh! [shouts and jeers]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (malicious chuckle)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he flies back, further into the chamber, about 15 feet up, his back to the ceiling of the interior, that's going to end Lorenzo's turn. It is now Ruzza's turn. Ruzza, who saw you first run over there, Caduceus, is going attempt to cast Confusion on you. So I need you, Caduceus, to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A wisdom saving throw. That's a 27.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Up is down, the world makes no sense, and as you clasp your eyes tight once more, you manage to shrug off the magical effect. You look back at Ruzza who notices that the spell has faded and goes, "Oh, shit!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughing) Ah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: He hasn't been the same since he left the Fugees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Ruzza is going to run the other direction to try and get away from you. That's going to end Ruzza's turn. That brings us now to the other thug. The one that is up against you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I thought you said the other fuck and I was like, he is a fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know. That thug is going to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Still heard it! Same thing. Keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is going to attempt to move away from you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So take your attack of opportunity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hell yeah. I was going to say: sentinel, I don't want him getting away. Hm, 15. No 16! 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! All right, not bad. Ten damage and he is not moving. Bish!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not very good up close, and really wanted that range and took a gamble and it didn't work in his favor. But that's okay. All right, that finishes his go. Caduceus you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Blindness. On this beautiful, beautiful singer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, is that a constitution saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is a constitution-- let me double check. Yeah, that's a constitution saving throw against 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, no effect.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're trading spells, both of you manage to shrug each other off. It's this massive duel of wits and willpower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you wish to move, as well?

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: Don't die on us!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, it's happening. You know, I'm just going to scoot a little-- No, I'm fine where I am, I think. It's just-- Yeah, that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shakäste. Your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shakäste!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) Shakäste!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Well let's see, I have The RZA right here in front of me, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. Right at the bottom of the stairs.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Titi!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the form of this Egyptian-- This incredible ancient Egyptian woman from a world far from here apparates on the other side of Ruzza, go ahead and make your attack roll with a d20.

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: Turn her on!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Got to get that (engine revving).

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: So it's...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus seven.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Plus seven, so 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 is not going to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nefertiti! Ugh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right. You still have your action if you wanted to--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see--

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: Sacred Flame!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa, the audience turned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's have the Duchess come fly back towards me and the other side of the chamber. Just to make sure that there's nothing-- Yeah, yeah, further. Yeah, over on that side, just to make sure, just because nobody's really investigated there yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. The Duchess swings over and takes a look. It looks like this side of the chamber is empty. There's nobody else waiting in the wings.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Is that all we've got?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you have your action still.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Oh, we've still got an action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And your movement, yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: A little further over; not so close to Ruzza.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, so you can move over that way.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, back away. Yeah, there you go, that's more like it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a 14. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh)

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Can I make a defensive move?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It does not actually hit you, though.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Okay, all right. You know what? Be glad, RZA. Be glad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do manage to move away from the strike, no issue, and you still have your action if you wanted to use anything else, like a cantrip.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, let's go Sacred Flame at The RZA.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sacred Flame, that is a natural 18 plus three on the-- so it does not hit, unfortunately.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Damn. All right. Fuck you, RZA!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back to the top of the round. It is Protto's turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This little shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you talking about me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Protto is going to go ahead and drop the crossbow and pull out two shortswords.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, ugh. Mistake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to spin and dodge very quickly, quicker than you expected, around you Keg, still staying in melee range.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get an attack of opportunity on him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not leave your range, so does not provoke. He stays close enough, but whips around and is going to go ahead and make a strike with each blade towards you. That is going to be a 12.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hell no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just clangs off your armor, no issue. The second strike is going to be a 14.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cackling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I in melee range of Protto?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you are not.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I am going to run away. Towards Shakäste, and as I go, I will turn around and fire a crossbow bolt at Protto with sneak attack because--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next to Keg? Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aw, fuck you! It's only a 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit, unfortunately. It goes wide. Scrapes against the stone in the ceiling, and ricochets into oblivion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How much more movement do I have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have quite a bit more movement, but you'll be coming into melee range with Ruzza. But Ruzza cannot make an attack of opportunity against you because she already took one, so you can keep moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll use my bonus action to fire one more bolt at that stupid Protto.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Go ahead and roll damage with sneak attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No sneak attack though, right? Matt? No sneak attack, or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, sneak attack! Yeah, because Protto's still next to Keg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, that's 17.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Protto's looking pretty hurt as he takes it right in the abdomen (grunts), and his eyes are going wide and (grunting) keeps looking up, "Boss!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll keep moving as far as I can get around that wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get right next to Shakäste, and you're now right up against the wall, kind of between the wall and Shakäste.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. That brings us to Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where is Prada? Devil Wears Prada, where is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over there, next to Keg.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In the white thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, right on the opposite side.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Just behind him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: End him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to go kill this guy because he's pissing me off. I'm going to do my movement, I'm going to parkour off of the table that he knocked over, going to use Keg's shoulder to get the rest of the way over.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I imagine when Beau walks down the street, it's all parkour.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Front barrels into the door!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you vault over, pushing that way, the floating entity that is Lorenzo, who's coasting about 15 feet above you, and his wide form, having a ten-foot range with that glaive-- you just leave his combat range and he takes a swing of opportunity towards you. That is going to be a seven plus eight, that is a 15 to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Parkour!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She parkours!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Macy's Day Parade balloon; it's not good right now. It's bad. Okay, I'm going to unleash on Prada.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, do it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, first one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck him up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, Gil gave me a natural one. (singing) Fuck you, Gil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You swing towards Protto, Protto ducks out of the way, and your fist instead hits the edge of Keg's armor. Your hand goes back like that--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, sorry! Sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah! Why'd you put spikes on it?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I look cool!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck! Ow! Okay, next one. 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit, roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nine points of damage against him.

lines.name: MARISHA, MATT, AUDIENCE
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Down on the back of the head, and you can see blood spatter out of the nose and mouth across the stone. Looks back at you, like (grunting); still standing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Flurry of Blows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (kung fu movie accent) Flurry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. How many ki points do you have left now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. First attack-- that's cocked. I'm sorry, it was a good one too. Oh, it's the same roll though: 19! These are two off-handed, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so it's the d6.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, eight damage on the first one. And second one, same exact roll. 19 again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right; damage on the next one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And same roll again, nine. Two nines, 18 total damage.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: (pow pow pow)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first hit clocks the side of Protto's face: this weird, scraggly halfling goatee matted with his own blood. His blade still out, he looks up at you, grits his teeth and is the middle of saying, "I'm going to gut you--" (fist impact), and is out cold on the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just throw in a few more! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, one down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That your turn?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And with that, that brings us to Caleb and Keg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, this is still going very good, so I am going to slide along the wall that I'm on to try to get to the space where Beau had been before she started. Now that the little weasel is dead, ja, I'll stay against the wall if I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. And then I'm going to lose Invisibility because I start to weave my hand around my arm and I am going to release Scorching Ray, three globs of fire up his ass in the sky.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From out of the ether, a for-quite-a-while-invisible Caleb suddenly blinks into view as these glowing embers begin to swirl around his hands, turning into a gouting burst of flame. Go ahead and roll for your strikes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The second is a 19, and the third is a 23.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh! [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So 8d6 total. Ja.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Damage?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, the critical gets-- okay, so this becomes an eight. Okay, Hold on. Ja. Okay, so that's ten...Okay. Und that is eleven, okay. And then also this becomes 17... It's a total of 19 damage of Scorching Ray to his ass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of them burst across the muscular, but somewhat still rotund, like a barrel of muscle and blue rhinoceros hide. You see the flames leave these darkened, blackened spots on his exposed belly from the center of this leather armor strapped like a harness around his torso. He just looks at you, "Glad you could join us."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eh, Wie gehts? That's the end.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so he's how high right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's currently ten feet above you against the ceiling.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's no way I can just-- is there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could try off of the table for a strike, if you'd like.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, fuck it; okay. I'll try it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make an athletics check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Oh! (squeaks) Nine?

lines.name: MARISHA, AUDIENCE
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go and put your foot up onto the edge of the splintered wood that is still damaged from the impacts you had earlier, and as you go to leap, the wood gives out from under you and the table collapses, so you're unable to quite get in range with him at the moment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Then I'm going to go try to fuck with The RZA.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: Get a room!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Solid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. There's Ruzza right there, you manage to get into contact.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to smack. That's a 19 plus seven. I think that maybe hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, very good, and here we go. That'll be ten points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take that, Wu Tang Clan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did that athletics jump count as an action, I'm assuming?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Was the athletics check an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was more part of your movement, so--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I can hit her two more times?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two more times, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And that is 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 does not hit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, that's damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, 12 points of damage! There you go. Oof, all right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then one more time, just for fun, and that will be a 16 plus seven, which I believe also hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, yeah. Go ahead and roll damage again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on! Big money, no whammies! Well, that was kind of a whammy: five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, got it. Ruzza's taken a few hits and you're now starting to see blood streaks across the face from where the heavy flat side of your warhammer has smashed into her jaw. Some of the teeth seem to be cracked, and you see her spit one out onto the stone. "All right, I see your "game again, Keg."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, babe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it is now Lorenzo's turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit. Caleb? Stay safe, Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [background music]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's trying. He's working the angles right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's really thinking. Oh man. The equations.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's thinking about all of the great stuff available at D&D Beyond.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And with that, after the scorching strikes that were against him, Lorenzo's going to coast through the air, arms out at the side wielding the giant, jagged glaive, grinning, smiling towards Caleb. (malicious laugh) And is going to arc down just enough to catch you on the outside of the glaive's range. Two strikes against you. The first one is going to be a 14 to hit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's so weak!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dead, the word is dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be 14 points of slashing damage. The next is going to be a 15 to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shield! Shield! Shield!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 15 points of slashing damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you still conscious?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cooing) Shield! (coo)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who hurt you?

lines.name: AUDIENCEMEMBER
lines.text: Lorenzo!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, he's going to go ahead and shift further--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Back, just keeping an eye. Keeping his options open, making sure he's not too far from anybody. That's going to go ahead and end Lorenzo's turn, it's now Ruzza's turn. Ruzza is going to expend a level three Hold Person--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Keg.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Surprise, surprise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need you both to make wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Come on, come on.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [groaning]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, where is The RZA on the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Next to Nefertiti.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a unique setup for the live show, so thank you for being patient.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the matchup you've all been waiting for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel it encasing your brain, your body begins to tighten for a second before you manage to have it have no effect. However, behind you over there, Beau's body seizes and freezes up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's oddly painful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ruzza's going to, as a bonus action, look up and say "All right, Lorenzo! I think it's time you "really, er, really show them what you've got, buddy!" She's going to give a d8 inspiration die to Lorenzo.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Ruzza's turn; Caduceus, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, okay. This'll be fun. I'm going to-- Let's try something weird, I like weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like weird.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a couple steps towards the wall and I'm going to get a little closer to that terrible little bard there. I'm going to put my back against the upward wall, so that I'm out of range of the big blue. Am I, like, 15 feet from the bard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perfect. I'm going to cast Spirit Guardians. I'm going to start whispering into my big purple crystal and then tons of tiny little adorable, sharp-toothed fairies are going to come out and start biting and eating a lot. They're adorable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, I believe that's a wisdom saving throw for Ruzza?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a wisdom saving throw for half damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 14 plus two, so 16. What's your DC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ooh. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that's half damage from the Spirit Guardians.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, that's fine; it stays up forever. Let's see, where's the damage? Oh, there it is! One, two. I don't have enough dice for this, that's great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let me have a d8. So that's (counting) nine points halved of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much total?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Half of nine points of radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So four. Four points to Ruzza.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As long as he's in the range of it, he's at half speed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's at half speed. Got it. Cool. Spirit Guardians is up. That's your action?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is my action. As a bonus action, sorry, I'm learning this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't think you have much in the way of bonus actions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I thought I had a thing I could do! Sorry, one second. I don't have much. As a bonus action, I'm going to-- can I see Caleb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: As a bonus action can I cast Healing Word as a level two spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You cannot, because you've already cast a level one spell. Only a cantrip.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only a cantrip now, okay. Nevermind, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn? Shakäste. You're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shakäste!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I would like to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I would like to Command Lorenzo to freeze.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what is the Command word on that one?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: So I can tell him, you know, as far as-- that means you can't do nothing. You just got to stand there, you've got to do nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well you've got Halt, which means they don't move and take no actions. Okay, is that what you're doing?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Freeze, baby. Just like in the 1970s television with Starsky & Hutch. When they say freeze, you don't do shit. You just sit there, and do nothing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Resists the command. I'm sorry! You still have your Nefertiti.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right. Let's see, we're so close to-- let's see if we can knock out The RZA.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Make the attack roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She sucks.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Fuck me and my Mom! Why?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've got to do it in Egyptian!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's a what? I rolled a three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's not going to hit.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's a ten! It's a ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nefertiti's still trying to apparate! She hasn't quite taken her full form yet. The spiritual energy hasn't coalesced enough to have an impact, but she's on her way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's going to be the MVP, man. I can feel it. When it works, it's going to be glorious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Would you like to move?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It's going to be amazing. Would I like to move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Egypt is just so far away!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah. Just back away. Back into that corner there. Yeah, back to The Duchess. Son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so that ends Shakäste's turn. Top of the round: Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is anyone engaged with The RZA?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently Keg is, yes.

lines.name: SAM
