lines.text: I will attack The RZA. Not good, 16. Oh, no-- yeah, 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's 17 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, girl! Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Us ladies have to stick together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Girl power!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is she still alive, The RZA?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, though hurt very badly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll shoot one more time, why not? That is 17 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just seven that time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven points of damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Ruzza takes the next bolt-- the first one strikes right in the sternum area and sinks in rather deep. Instinctively, she reaches up and grabs it, (grunt of pain), looks over in the direction where it came from, and at that moment, the second crossbow bolt goes right into the throat. She opens her mouth, trying to make a sound, and instead nothing but blood pours out of the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just say--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hell yeah! [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just back up even further.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'll back up a little bit, you said?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Back up even further, away from any danger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over by Shakäste?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or all the way to the furnace?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, in the testes area up there. The little closet thing that's-- yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. That ends your turn; that brings us to Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to turn around, and can I quickly flip the table that Protto had flipped over-- flip it back onto its legs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, sure. You manage to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (impact) Then I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is your action. Because you have to grab it, and it's a whole motion to get it up there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (singing) Jump on it! Then I'm going to take my bonus action to do Patient Defense. I'm going to look at Lorenzo and be like: Your new look sucks, man! Then do Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Patient Defense, good. All righty. Caleb and Keg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I am bleeding profusely everywhere, and I am going to stumble in the direction-- I think that's Keg, she's short. I will go that way as far as I can, and as I go I say: This is going very well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have ten more feet, you can go in either direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I go to the right, will I clear out of that flying guy's line of sight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two more spaces. You can go near Caduceus--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to cut directly right towards Caduceus and just before I disappear out of view, I'm going to say: Hey, how's your day? And I will send a Fire Bolt at Lorenzo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja. Eh, it's not that great. It's a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, this has been exciting.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. That's good. That's also good. So 14 points of fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flames burst across, you see the leather cracks in one part of the harness. He just grins back at you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, and then hopefully I'm disappearing around the corner and leaning my face against the wall, like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Keg?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm rushing and I'm jumping on top of the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This table, man.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the centerpiece of our attack plan. Is that enough--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, Keg. This is just like Titanic. Just me and you, floating on this--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keg is... in love? It's gone past just arousal. Can I reach Lorenzo from the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly, yeah. You give a little jump as you swing; he's just in reach with the table's help.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, here we go. 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six points of damage, nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Here we go again, on my own. That will not hit. And one more time, for the cheap seats; that will not hit. Okay, go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. But you still get one swing that cuts through and carves through part of the outer leg and calf of Lorenzo. The leg gets pushed back a bit from the impact as he's floating. His large, almost-corpulent form, though of solid muscle, just sitting there, enduring it. His face focus comes from where Caleb was back towards you and says, "Well, glad you could join the party, Keg." That ends your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That makes it Lorenzo's turn.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: No!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to decide to turn over a new leaf, and--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Manage a Bed Bath & Beyond. It's going to be nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He gets into real estate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's so much thinking when Lorenzo's turn comes up and it's very scary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I get a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [groaning]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are we standing next to each other?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You guys tried--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wait, once he's within 15 feet of me, he gets half speed. Oh, no, he's not walking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spirit Guardian still slows his movement, I believe. Does it say walking speed, or just walking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once he enters the field he also, I believe--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Has to make a wisdom save, which is a 12 plus four, 16.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 16 is the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So take half damage, roll for damage. He still takes damage. You also watch, as Lorenzo coasts through the air, some of the wounds that he suffered seem to be slowly sealing up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: God, this guy. Matt, there's an audience here that deserves a certain amount of death and payoff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is radiant damage doing anything to him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing more than just terrible radiant damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It blasts him, and as he pulls into the area, he goes, "Ooh. That's not going to do," and vanishes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No! Why?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caduceus, it's your turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm having Raishan flashbacks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm having a little regret that I didn't pack that Faerie Fire, man.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Aw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Who knew? I was drinking tea last time I got to pick spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Faerie Fire is one of the best fucking spells, man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's over there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know, do you want to go see?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I want to run over there--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you're looting?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use your action to make a perception check if you want to glare through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll get me that close? I would like to be a little further away so that I am not in blast radius with two other people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. Looks to be a little better. Darn it, yeah. I'm going to use my action to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check with disadvantage because there is no light source inside that chamber, and you do not have darkvision, which I remembered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stage whisper) Liam, don't you have a potion or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make your roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean-- (cooing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. Looking through, it's hard to see, but you can make out a few shapes; they look to be humanoid figures that are still gagged and chained on the far-back side of the interior there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was my action to take a look in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You're peering in very closely to try and make out the details of an area with no light source in the middle of combat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aw, man. Okay, that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weirdly, the map looks even more like my penis now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, finishing Caduceus's turn. Shakäste, you're up.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right, I guess Shakäste and the Duchess will move into the chamber and check the other side of this chamber now that it's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whereabouts do you want to go?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: As far to the other side of this penis as we can get, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's about as far as you can get with your movement.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Have the Duchess follow me as well. Go ahead and go to the end of the chamber there--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right over here?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, and perch there. Can she see inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check for the Duchess with a disadvantage.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yes it is, it's at disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever you rolled.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven plus...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to make out anything in there.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Hard to see in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You know, why don't you hang back? Is there any light in that chamber that Thaumaturgy could maybe illuminate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a candelabra that has low light over there that is giving a faint glow and there are two torches in the sides here that are also giving off this low red-orange--

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: But nothing in the room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nothing in the room, no.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: We might as well Thaumaturgy to see if we can make a little more light in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do so, the flames flare up, and the long shadows stretch from beyond the bars into the chamber and you can see an unconscious figure on the far back end that is also in full manacles: chained, and gagged-- facing away from you. You can't see any more details than that.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: That's really all I've got. I can't start working on these locks at all, can I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not with using Thaumaturgy as your action, no.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right, there you go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Back to the top-- Nott, what are you doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me? I'm going to peek around the corner; do I see anything or anyone to attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see anybody in there. You could make a perception check if you want to use that as your action. It's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there a way I can hide but still see around the corner? No?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. I mean 15, it's decent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just hold my action until I see something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. What are you holding?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A crossbow bolt, ready to fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Beau.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to do the same thing: I am going to crouch down and I'm going to pull two ninja stars, and I'm going to hold my action until I see Lorenzo.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. Caleb, Keg.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They will get to you lickity-split. You're going to be fine. But you know, maybe in the meantime I will pull that potion out of-- where is it? That's not it. No, that's licorice; hold on, that's-- In our game, it's a bonus action to quaff a potion? Am I remembering that right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're keeping that rule for our game.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So I'll shove that in my gullet. That's totally the wrong die. Oh, that's okay. Seven points back. Okay, I'm cured!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Absolved of all dam-- no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That probably won't work, but let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for an attack with disadvantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a total of 12.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It just burst into stone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We did it, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would a perception check give me any indication of what Lorenzo is doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, I'll give it a go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you use your action to make a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That is 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You just, looking over your shoulder, see some sort of shift across the stone, like the pattern just moves and quakes ever so faintly unnaturally against what would be the rather still though warm air.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right next to me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use your bow and arrow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a javelin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could try to javelin.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shall I try to javelin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, here we go! 17?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well it was your action to try and perceive where this--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But can I bonus action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't take a bonus action attack unless you've used your attack action before it, unfortunately.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tits McGee. Okay. Huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't you heal? (pigeon coos) Heal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Heal? I'm maxed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I will hop off the table and move toward Nefertiti. Can I get closer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can go there if you want. Or there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll go there, yeah, there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That finishes your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (pigeon coos)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I communicate that information to the group as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you tell them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think there's something spooky happening on the stone over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh no, ghosts!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Keg walks forward pointing in that direction, a familiar voice rings out right before you and says, "Oh little girl, you're making crafting this nightmare too easy." With that, there's this curl of blueish arcane energy right before you. Your hair begins to blow back from the force as a cold temperature begins to gather directly ahead. With that, in a brief instant Lorenzo appears before you in his large demonic form and unleashes--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I have range?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Confetti!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think I see him!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At least he's not floating.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: [horrified gasping]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, I did not see Caleb in that cone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A Cone of Cold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We get our held actions for when we see him, though, first?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, it happens simultaneously.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (nervously) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make your attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one is an 18, second one's a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well you only make one attack-- no two attacks. I've allowed that house rule. Held attacks get the extra attack feature, so go for it. So both hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Both hit. First one. 13 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Second one-- wait! No, I'm wrong. These are throwing stars.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're throwing stars, yeah. Sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one. Okay. Seven damage. Second one: five damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nott you also got one as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Missed. Rolled a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rolled a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah no.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? What is that number? Why are you saying that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I need Caduceus, Beau, Shakäste, and Keg to all roll constitution saving throws, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got this.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Roll this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13? You just succeed.

lines.name: ASHLEY, LIAM, AUDIENCE
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Nice.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Shakäste, you each suffer 44 points of cold damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! No!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Were you at 33? You're unconscious.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau is unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Shakäste's unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ugh!

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I should have stayed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nefertiti vanishes. That's 22 points of cold damage to both Keg and Caduceus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy. Guys...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 22 points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the body of the thug you had killed earlier, the body of Ruzza, and the body of Protto. Frozen statues, corpses on the ground turned to sheer flash-frozen ice. There, on the ground covered and encased in pieces of frozen air and moisture from the vicinity, the unconscious and dying bodies of Beauregard and Shakäste.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do get an attack of opportunity.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's an 18!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven damage. All righty. With that, it goes to Caduceus' turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First thing I'm going to do is use my bonus action--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A little gardening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To pot a very nice plant. Oh man, it's so hard to do this. Okay, I'm going to use my bonus action to Spare the Dying to you, so we got that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Spare the Dying is an action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, Spare the Dying for me is a bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No more death saves. I'm going to run over to Beau; I'm going to tap her and use-- Where's my 1st-level spells? Is it Cure Wounds?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cure Wounds is the first level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But I can cast it at a 2nd-level if I have a 2nd-level left?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to cast Cure Wounds, but because she's unconscious she gets all the hit points back, not just-- [cheering]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At what level?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're at 21 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh? What?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're at 21 hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What level did you cast it at?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Level two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's 2d8--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hit points!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) What does Spare the Dying do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It means he doesn't have to make death saves at least for the moment, but probably could use some healing and I've already used all my actions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ending Caduceus' turn. Shakäste, you are stable. You can still move if you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to back up against the one in the corner so I have a little bit of cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, the other corner. Yeah a little coverage, there we are.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go. Caduceus' turn's up. Shakäste, you don't have to make any death saving throws because Spare the Dying, so you're fine, but that's your turn. To the top of the round, Nott, you're up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits. Roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nine points of damage.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'll run back to my cubbyhole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're prone. You have to use half your movement to get up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get up. Still have 20 feet of movement left. Can I make it to Lorenzo?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, I'm so mad. How far away am I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are ten feet from Lorenzo.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And-- I'm going to spend my last ki point to do Stunning Strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hell yes! Oh my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's stunned?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: ASHLEY, AUDIENCE
lines.text: (chanting) Beau!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a golden god!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go full Ip Man on the next attack with advantage. So everyone has advantage. Oh god, I thought it was a natural 20, but a 21 total!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, did I do damage for the first one?

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need you guys every week.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh, that was a one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you want to do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Five points of damage, and then my last bonus action attack with advantage. Same roll, 13 on both. No, a 16. I'll take that 16, plus seven? That hits, and then eight damage. Pop-pop-pop! He's stunned for a round. Everyone has advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, in melee. Or actually, for stunned, attack rolls have advantage, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Attack rolls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lay it on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's my fault for not having him fly to the ceiling last turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around and with all the rage, popping blood vessels, I say: (shouting) Fuck him up! [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb and Keg?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Ah-- I would like to push myself up the stairs as far as I can, while still being able to have a bead on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any higher up the stairs and you won't be able to see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Then I will collapse onto my ass on the stairs and make that symbol shape thing that Fjord used to make, and go: Ey, buddy. I will send out another Fire Bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have advantage on the attack roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a 16. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? That hits, that just hits. Sorry, I was doing math in my head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No worries. That's six points of fire damage, and I will now push myself up out of sight, up the stairs a little bit. It's going very well. Shakäste will get to you any second.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, here we go! Don't fuck me! Yes, 20, bam. Bing bam boom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They all have advantage, so roll twice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, here we go. Nope. 14 doesn't hit, does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit. Unable to penetrate the hide with that third strike. It hits the outside of the muscular blubber on his giant torso and it shimmies and shakes and then tightens. All right, that ends your turn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, it is now Lorenzo's turn. Lorenzo shrugs off the stun at the end, but can do nothing else on his turn, and is still locked. As soon as he gets his ability to speak back, goes, "Oh, y'all being tricksy. I like it." That's going to bring us to Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to run over to Shakäste and while I'm running, I'm going to use my bonus action to down a potion of healing, which is-- let's see if I'm doing this right. That's seven hit points that I regain. I should mark that as used. Then once I'm there, I have to use an action to feed him a potion, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Here's the question: does the potion also get my bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because it's not your healing spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured not, but I thought it was worth asking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (nasally voice) It's worth an inquiry. Most definitely!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish that was Lorenzo's voice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to give you a potion, and let's see what I roll. That's (counting) 15 hit points. You're awake again. I'm going to use the rest of my movement to get some cover behind the table, I suppose, is the closest cover I've got right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could push it. The table is righted now, so it's an empty space.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm getting partial cover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Finishing Caduceus' turn, Shakäste, you are conscious now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Smoke them if you got them, man.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Let's see. Up to six creatures of your choice that you can see within range.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the range? 60? You can see everybody but Caleb. You can heal everybody but Caleb, because he went way up the stairs. You don't even know where he is. You came to consciousness and Caleb's gone.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: All right. Who's in need here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is going very well!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't see me.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I say: Everybody that I can see, except Caleb, gets mass healing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d4 plus your wisdom modifier, which is four. So roll a d4.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money, big money! That's good!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone but Caleb heals seven hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Seven points! Oh my god. I'm feeling a little better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to stay put, Shakäste? Or are you going to move somewhere?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Nefertiti is still floating, is she not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you lost her, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Worst prop ever.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Still love you! Still love you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's all right. You can still move if you want to; it's up to you.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: We should move away. I'm going to move back into the testicle area. No, go around. Yeah, there you go. Then into the testicle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now cough.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Bring the Duchess with me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just cup around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. That ends your go. Top of the round: Nott, you're up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do the same thing. Poke out. Shoot. Is Lorenzo engaged with anyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is engaged with both Beau and Keg.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 19 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's finish this. That is 17 points of damage plus Fury of the Small-- --make it 22. Then I'll shoot again! Nope, miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That bolt impacts and now that you guys are close enough, both Keg and Beau: as the bolt hits, the wear and tear in Lorenzo's form is really starting to show. Wounds are-- they're still closing with each round that comes back to his go, but the wounds' closing seems to be slowing, or at least the wounds are getting more and more deep and dangerous. He's looking quite haggard and wounded.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, you're up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, seeing where Nott just put a bunch of bolts in him, I'm going to flat hand, palm the bolts right deeper into him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: First one. That is successful, 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah that hits, roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 just hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And that's seven damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice. He's looking real hurt.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keg?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keg!

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: (chanting) Keg!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, here we go! Not a great start. 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go to swing, now being wounded and looking-- a glare of desperation in the burning red eyes of Lorenzo. You swing and he grabs the hilt of your weapon as it swings downward, and holds it aloft and in your face and goes, "Try it."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! Fuck! Nine.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Nein!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The other hand grabs the other weapon, and you're just locked in that moment now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Last one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keg!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Please! 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit, roll damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, come on, come on, come on! Six?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [groaning]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! I wish I had saved it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wish you had saved it. She used it last session and they didn't take a short rest. Sorry, guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, sorry!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was so almost awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, of course they're going to come for you because you could have fucked off days ago but you're a big team player now! Oh, I better try to hit that guy again. I will scooch down again. Oh, he's holding both of her blades. Okay, well, I probably won't hit, but let's do it again, pew pew! That is a six-- 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 does not hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11 points of damage.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of calculator.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? [cheering]

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: (chanting) Caleb!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, well fuck me running, it worked. I watch it leave my finger and take an impossible spiralling trajectory through the air, and he's so preoccupied with that charming dwarf woman with the stubble, it takes him in the back of the head and it starts to burn through the back of his skull and eat away through the back of his head and burn through his eyes! [cheering]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What the fuck?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Monks, man.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I need a drink.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hey, welcome back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Keg just falls to her knees and starts crying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go get some of the ash off the ground and give it to Mr. Clay and say: Maybe you could make some tea with this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do I get any sense of what this is? I'm going to do Detect Undead, I'm going to see if I can understand what he was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an arcana check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, in the meantime, DM, I--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Definitely don't want to make tea from this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I figured.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was something entirely different. You've heard terms thrown around, like "ogre mage," but this is commonly referred to in children's nursery rhymes-- the kind that are meant to scare kids from going out at night-- as an oni.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if there's much we can do with this. This is a bit-- yeah, no, you don't want to drink that. Let's sweep that away, why don't we?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau is going to immediately run over here to this undiscovered prison ballsack region.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's four balls on this dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and start figuring out how to open that other gate that I'm next to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make a check. Do you have thieves' tools?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I was just going to hit it with my stick until the lock broke, or hit the lock with Sacred Flame or something fun. Just blow it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a while with it before you realize this particular type of metal seems to be made to endure such spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can help a little, if--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, no, I want to watch. This looks like fun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was so cool. Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That little boost of confidence was just enough for you to find every tumbler within one quick attempt, and with a swift (click and creak) it hangs open to the inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: After you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, thank you. I'll go in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a question. I don't know if the situation calls for it-- I rolled a voluntary wisdom save for--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you for reminding me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja, but I rolled an 18, so it's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll just run over to Jester and give her a hug and just say: Case closed.

lines.name: AUDIENCE
lines.text: Aww!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're all unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all unconscious, yeah. At this point you can see, coming down the stairs behind you, Caleb, the older fellow that you had saved earlier with the swollen eye. Behind him, the dwarf and the child. He seems to have been able to free them from the cage, and they come down and say, "Is it over? Is it safe?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's better than it was.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: It will be. It's absolutely better than it was, but I think you should thank these people who came down into the catacombs. This is the second time that I've come across these people and they've gone from fresh air into dark, dank air for no other reason than to find people and to help them out. They're special as far as I'm concerned and you should remember them. So what do we call you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Us?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Yeah, you! I mean, you're obviously--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The Mighty Nein seems pretty amorphous at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, we thought it would be a joke in the beginning, it kind of stuck. It doesn't make any sense. I'm going to go sit on the table that got knocked all over the place during that fight and sit and just stare at the three unconscious and feel very tired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shakäste, did you say something about making all this better than what it was?

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I've been doing it a long time on my own; it feels good to know that there are other people out here doing the same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You know? It can get a little crazy talking to a little bird all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (buzzing) onto your shoulder.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What did you say to me, Nott? Some are people are just good?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You guys keep doing good things, and all I've seen is you doing good things. I'm not sure what the confusion is about.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: [laughter]

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Every once in a while, I run into people, and I find that a lot of people do a lot of talking, but I've always found it's the people who hush and do good things are the best ones. I'd say that you're in that class. If you ever hear the word "hush," know that I'm close. I'm going to take these people and get them back to where they belong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that's when we were bad people, and now I guess we're good now? So here. It was about 20, 25 gold.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Spend it on something you like.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (quickly) You're very handsome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are both cages open at this point, or just the one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One is open, the other is still closed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We still haven't found your partner. He's not here yet, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It was a pie in the sky thing. I'm sure he's long gone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's open the other cage.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: You never can tell.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right. I can't.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'll go ahead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I'll assist.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: 17 plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that'll do it. It opens up, and on the inside of the chamber there is just Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's all right.

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: I'm sorry.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's get your friends out of here, huh?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you going to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to keep looking?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what I'm going to do. I've only been thinking about killing that son of a bitch now. I don't really know what my life is going to be like. I'll probably go on a nice drunken bender for a while, and then when I come to, I'll figure something out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do either of you want to come with?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can sneak out in the morning, if you want. It won't be weird.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, that sounds good. Yeah, totally! Cool, cool, cool, cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was it Shakäste just said? Get yourself something nice?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know what is happening. Keg is aroused.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gathering up the rest of those who were captured by the Iron Shepherds, Shakäste shepherds them off to their proper locations, free and far from the confines, outside of the Dwendalian Empire. The rest of you, with your friends in tow, make your way back towards Shadycreek Run and to the rest of the morning light, which now begins to slowly curl over the distant mountains. A long evening, exhausted and tired. You look forward to enjoying comfort, alcohol, and whatever else transpired thereafter.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: KHARY
lines.text: [cheering]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [cheering] [music]
